properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 6 at 7:39AM EST until February 7 at 7:37PM EST by NWS Morristown TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a flood
advisory for the Toccoa/Ocoee River...

Toccoa/Ocoee River Above Copperhill TN affecting Fannin and Polk
Counties

The National Weather Service in Morristown, TN has issued a
* Flood Advisory for
The Toccoa/Ocoee River Above Copperhill TN
* At 07 AM Thursday the stage was 5.3 feet.
* Action stage is 6.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* The river will continue to rise to near 7.5 feet today.
* At 8.0 feet...Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of
woodlands, fields and backyards of homes near the river upstream
and downstream from the gage off Tennessee Highway 68 or Ocoee
Street in Copperhill Tennessee. The rock access road to the gage
will begin to flood. Flooding begins in the backyards of homes and
the Horsebend Park in McCaysville Georgia.
properties.instruction:
Most deaths in floods occur in automobiles. If you come to a closed
or flooded road, Turn Around! Don't Drown! For more details, stay
tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or commercial television or radio
stations that carry weather information.
